title: Seat
description: Used to describe a seat, such as a reserved seat in an event reservation.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

seatNumber.description: The location of the reserved seat (e.g., 27).

seatRow.description: The row location of the reserved seat (e.g., B).

seatSection.description: The section location of the reserved seat (e.g. Orchestra).
